results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits NLRP3 Inflammasome Activation and Ameliorates Lung Injury in Hyperoxia-Induced Bronchopulmonary Dysplasia via the KLF2-Mediated Mechanism
results.text_hl: In this study, in vivo and in vitro experiments were conducted to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could ameliorate hyperoxia-induced @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ and explore its potential mechanism.

results.title: Amelioration of Endotoxin-Induced Acute Lung Injury and Alveolar Epithelial Cells Apoptosis by Simvastatin Is Associated with Up-Regulation of Survivin/NF-kB/p65 Pathway
results.text_hl: To strengthen the results of a protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@ALI@@@, this will be evaluated in other septic @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ models.

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates acute lung injury by activation of A2B adenosine receptor.
results.text_hl: Lastly, the levels of A2BAR, @GENE_CFTR @GENE_24255 @@@CFTR@@@, @GENE_CLDN4 @GENE_304407 @@@claudin4@@@, and @GENE_CLDN18 @GENE_315953 @@@claudin18@@@ were also measured by qRT-PCR and Western blotting. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment, in a dose-related manner, markedly improved the @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Injury</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung histological injury@@@ and decreased the levels of @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@, @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL-1beta@@@, and increased @GENE_IL10 @GENE_25325 @@@IL-10@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ induced @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@ALI@@@.
